entry.title: MIT AI model is 'significantly' better at predicting breast cancer
entry.quote: The model can find breast cancer earlier and eliminates racial disparities in screening.

entry.title: Tukey, Design Thinking, and Better Questions
entry.quote: Far better an approximate answer to the right question, which is often vague, than an exact answer to the wrong question, which can always be made precise.

entry.title: Google backs a bid to use CRISPR to prevent heart disease
entry.quote: The startup, Verve Therapeutics, said it had raised $58.5 million from investors including Alphabet's venture fund, GV. What makes Verve different? Most gene-therapy companies have gone after rare diseases like hemophilia. But Verve thinks editing peopleâ€™s DNA could instead help solve the most common cause of death.
